page.title: 07Sawston/Babraham Shopping.
page.content: The shopping facilities in the two villages are strongly contrasted. In {Babraham}a small General Store/Post Office until 1974, when the building was sold. In 1980, as a result of a meeting, another small Post Office and Store was opened.This is used mainly by lorry drivers passing through. The villagers tend to prefer the range and prices offered by Cambridge supermarkets,although some shop in {Sawston.} Report of Shopping Survey in{Sawston.} Most of the people who shop here live in the village or the surrounding area.61% of the people questioned liked shopping. 45% thought that facilities in Sawston were adequate,37% thought they were very good, and the rest thought they could be better. 46% went out of{Sawston}to do some of their shopping. Most of
